reviewText: I get here quickly. However the subtitles for this DVD were horrible. :/ The characters names were all incorrect and not to mention the grammar sucked. Great quality for the video, but the subtitles sucked.
Funny over the top melodrama with a capable cast. I suspect the 'official' one would  contain the summer special as well.

The video and sound were very good but the English subtitles were not very good. The names were all wrong and several other things wrong too. I've bought Korean dramas before and they were all ok. Maybe it's this particular company.
